name: Urban-Technology Group
tag_list: mobile-wireless, telecommunications, independent-consulting, seattle, tem, wem
overview:
Urban-Technology Group is a Seattle-based independent consulting firm, focused on helping companies reduce costs by effectively managing their mobile wireless and telecommunications services, software and hardware.

We serve as a trusted advocate and advisor, providing direction, support and resources to help you take full advantage of your mobile wireless and telecommunications technologies. Our experienced consultants design, implement and support solutions that:

Leverage leading-edge technology to support your business operations.

Eliminate the burden on internal resources to manage these technologies.

Save you time and money.

Whether you are looking for a total wireless management solution or an assessment of your telecommunications and wireless spend, we provide the information you need to make smart technology decisions for your business.
